en.title: Welcome
en.description: This is the English description for MindBridge — the AI-assisted platform for mental-health appointments.
en.hero_subtitle: MindBridge connects patients and psychologists instantly. Real-time availability, smart matching, reminders, and secure payments — all in one place.
en.feature1_description: A visual calendar that syncs across your practice. Check availability, prevent conflicts, and let AI suggest the best slots and matches.
en.feature2_description: Manage your entire workflow from one secure dashboard: bookings, reminders (WhatsApp/SMS/email), online payments, and virtual sessions.
en.feature3_description: Every psychologist or clinic gets a customizable profile with specialties, modalities, pricing, and availability to help patients choose confidently.
en.feature1_item_1: See every provider’s schedule and bookings in real time.
en.feature1_item_3: Patients book in seconds — you just supervise.
en.feature1_item_4: Filter by specialty, modality, or provider.
en.feature2_item_1: Accept fast, secure payments right in the app.
en.feature2_item_2: Define services, prices, and durations with ease.
en.feature2_item_3: Track appointments and availability at a glance.
en.feature3_item_1: Add and manage psychologists within your clinic brand.
en.feature3_item_2: Set working hours, modalities (online/in-person), pricing, and photos.
en.feature3_item_3: Showcase specialties and approach to attract the right patients.
en.feature3_item_4: Adjust notifications, booking rules, and privacy settings.
en.how_it_works_subtitle: Follow these simple steps to run a modern, patient-friendly mental-health practice.
en.step1_description: Sign up and access a personalized dashboard to centralize your practice.
en.step2_description: Register providers, define schedules, and manage calendars from one place.
en.step3_description: Set durations, fees, modalities, and specialties per provider.
en.step4_description: Add bio, specialties, address, telehealth links, payment methods, and more.
en.step5_description: Patients see live availability, book instantly, and receive reminders.
en.final_cta_title: Ready to modernize your mental-health practice?
en.final_cta_description: Optimize your operations, reduce no-shows, and improve continuity of care with MindBridge.
en.pricing_title: Flexible Plans for Independent Psychologists and Clinics
en.pricing_subtitle: Start free and upgrade anytime as your practice grows.
en.testimonials_subtitle: See why MindBridge is the ideal co-pilot for modern practices.
en.testimonial1_text: MindBridge cut our coordination time drastically. Patients book themselves and show up more consistently.
en.testimonial2_text: The calendar, reminders, and quick rebooking keep my agenda full without extra admin work.
en.testimonial3_text: I can highlight my specialties and availability. New patients find the right fit faster.
en.testimonial4_text: For our small clinic, the waitlist auto-fills empty slots and reduces lost revenue.
en.faq_subtitle: Answers to common questions from psychologists and patients.
en.faq_question1: Is MindBridge suitable for solo practitioners and clinics?
en.faq_answer1: Yes. MindBridge adapts to any size — from independent professionals to multi-provider clinics.
en.faq_question2: Do I need internet to use MindBridge?
en.faq_answer2: Yes. MindBridge is cloud-based and syncs data in real time to avoid conflicts.
en.faq_answer3: Absolutely. Automated WhatsApp/SMS/email reminders and waitlists help minimize missed appointments.
en.faq_answer4: Yes. You can try the full experience for 14 days with no commitment.
en.faq_question5: Does MindBridge handle payments and telepsychology?
en.faq_answer5: Yes. You can accept online payments, run video sessions, and manage both online and in-person modalities securely.
en.cta_title: Ready to transform your care journey?
en.cta_subtitle: MindBridge helps you manage appointments, reduce friction, and stay connected with patients.
en.video_des: Explore MindBridge’s core features and how it improves continuity of care.
en.tag: Take your mental-health practice to the next level
en.desc-prov: Follow these simple steps to efficiently manage your services and deliver a professional experience.
en.desc-prov-c: Register quickly and access your dashboard.
en.desc-prov-a: Define schedules and keep calendars organized.
en.desc-prov-s: Customize duration, price, modality, and specialties.
en.desc-prov-p: Add bio, address, payment methods, and more.
en.desc-prov-v: See all calendars and manage bookings in one place.
en.title-extra: Ready to manage your practice like never before?
en.desc-extra: Optimize workflows, engage patients, and elevate your professional presence.

es.title: Bienvenido
es.description: Esta es la descripción en español de MindBridge — la plataforma con IA para gestionar citas de salud mental.
es.hero_subtitle: MindBridge conecta pacientes y psicólogos al instante. Disponibilidad en vivo, emparejamiento inteligente, recordatorios y pagos seguros en un solo lugar.
es.feature1_description: Un calendario visual que se actualiza en vivo. Previene choques de horario y sugiere el mejor “match” paciente-terapeuta.
es.feature1_item_1: Ver la agenda y reservas del equipo en tiempo real.
es.feature1_item_3: Los pacientes reservan en segundos; tú solo supervisas.
es.feature1_item_4: Filtra por especialidad, modalidad o profesional.
es.feature2_description: Gestiona reservas, recordatorios (WhatsApp/SMS/email), pagos en línea y sesiones virtuales desde un panel seguro.
es.feature2_item_2: Define servicios, precios, duraciones y modalidad.
es.feature2_item_3: Monitorea disponibilidad y agenda del equipo.
es.feature3_description: Cada psicólogo o clínica cuenta con un perfil personalizable: especialidades, enfoque terapéutico, precios y disponibilidad.
es.feature3_item_1: Añade y gestiona psicólogos bajo tu marca.
es.feature3_item_2: Define horarios, modalidades, precios e imágenes.

es.step3_description: Configura duración, precios, modalidad (online/presencial) y especialidades.
es.step4_description: Agrega bio, especialidades, dirección, métodos de pago y más.
es.step5_description: Pacientes ven disponibilidad en tiempo real, reservan y reciben recordatorios.
es.final_cta_description: Optimiza la operación, reduce inasistencias y mejora la continuidad terapéutica con MindBridge.

es.testimonial2_text: Calendario, recordatorios y reprogramación rápida mantienen mi agenda llena sin tareas extra.
es.testimonial3_text: Resalto mis especialidades y disponibilidad. Los pacientes encuentran el ‘match’ correcto más rápido.

es.faq_question1: ¿MindBridge sirve para profesionales independientes y clínicas?
es.faq_answer1: Sí. MindBridge se adapta a cualquier tamaño — desde consultas individuales hasta clínicas.
es.faq_answer2: Sí. La plataforma es en la nube y sincroniza datos en tiempo real para evitar conflictos.
es.faq_answer3: Totalmente. Los recordatorios automáticos y la lista de espera ayudan a minimizar los no-shows.
es.faq_answer4: Sí. Puedes probar la experiencia completa por 14 días sin compromiso.
es.faq_answer5: Sí. Acepta pagos en línea, realiza sesiones virtuales y gestiona modalidades online/presencial de forma segura.
